notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: J.H. and Q.W. conceived the idea. Q.W. fabricated the devices and performed the device-efficiency measurement. Z.Y. conducted photoluminescence quantum yield measurement. N.Z. and A.M. conducted transient absorption measurement. J.Z., Y.D., and X.X. conducted X-ray diffraction measurement. P.R. conducted ICP measurement. X.W. and Y.Y. conducted the simulation. Q.W. and J.H. wrote the paper.
